Our Team

The NeuroXR Collaborative is led by faculty with psychiatric and informatics expertise and supported by a diverse team of students and staff. Our Research Operations team carries out procedures necessary to work with study participants and conduct high-quality investigations. Our Designers create our XR programs, from designing 3D environments and characters to programming and testing applications. Our work would not be possible without our Affiliate members, who contribute additional ideas, expertise, and effort needed for NeuroXR to have a successful present and future.
